title: New Game Mode Suggestion: DEATHMATCH
body:
So I know this probably isn't original as an idea, but has Rito ever considered a game mode (which would become rotating) that sort of skips the laning phase? I was thinking that every champ could get one or two items for free to start the game (the amount taking into account impact on early game champs). I know ARAM is meant to be the faster game mode, but I would love to start a summoners rift match as Yi with a BORK for example. 

The point of the game mode is that kills would be more free-flowing in a more deathmatch style. Passive gold income rate could be increased too.

replies.body: Sounds like a retarded version of aram
